review_data.title: The Haldenbach
review_data.content: Haldenbach Restaurant is a cozy restaurant in the centre of Zürih. The restaurant’s food was perfect. The Rindsfilet-Stroganoff mit Butternudeln was very good choice if you like meat. Our vegetarian friend tried the vegi-rösti and was satisfied. If you are in Zürich, it’a a good...More

review_data.title: Haldenbach Zürich
review_data.content: The best Cordon Bleu I ate. The service was perfect and the staff very friendly. My husband tried the Zürchergeschnetzeltes was delicious. The size was huge. I can advise this eestaurant without hesitation. There is a wide selection desserts.

review_data.title: Very good Swiss food at an affordable price
review_data.content: Very typical Swiss restaurant, simple atmosphere, good and friendly service. Among several options of Swiss dishes in the menu, we had a cordon bleu XXL format, about half a kilo, which was really good and tasty. Rösti were also great. Price affordable. Pity for the...More

review_data.title: A fabulous traditional Swiss dinner and a restaurant host who was very friendly.

review_data.title: Good food for affordable prices.

review_data.title: Small and cosy restaurant with excellent food
